Class User

java.lang.Object
application.User
public class User extends Object
The User class represents a user entity in the system. It contains the user's details such as userName, password, and roles.

Users can have multiple roles, which determine their permissions within the system. Available roles include "student", "reviewer", "instructor", "staff", and "admin".

    The unique username identifier for this user

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String userName, String password, Set<String> roles)
      Constructs a new User with the specified userName, password, and roles.
      Parameters:
      userName - the unique identifier for this user
      password - the password for authentication
      roles - the set of roles assigned to this user

    • User

      public User(String userName, String password, Set<String> roles, boolean discussionsMuted, boolean DMMuted)
      Constructs a new User with the specified userName, password, roles, and mute settings.
      Parameters:
      userName - the unique identifier for this user
      password - the password for authentication
      roles - the set of roles assigned to this user
      discussionsMuted - whether discussions are muted for this user
      DMMuted - whether direct messages are muted for this user

      roles - the new set of roles

    • isDiscussionsMuted

      public boolean isDiscussionsMuted()
      Checks if discussions are muted for this user.
      Returns:
      true if discussions are muted, false otherwise

    • setDiscussionsMuted

      public void setDiscussionsMuted(boolean muted)
      Sets whether discussions are muted for this user.
      Parameters:
      muted - true to mute discussions, false to unmute

    • isDMMuted

      public boolean isDMMuted()
      Checks if direct messages are muted for this user.
      Returns:
      true if direct messages are muted, false otherwise

    • setDMMuted

      public void setDMMuted(boolean muted)
      Sets whether direct messages are muted for this user.
      Parameters:
      muted - true to mute direct messages, false to unmute

    • toggleDiscussionsMuted

      public boolean toggleDiscussionsMuted()
      Toggles the discussion mute status for this user.
      Returns:
      the new mute status

    • toggleDMMuted

      public boolean toggleDMMuted()
      Toggles the direct message mute status for this user.
      Returns:
      the new mute status

    • canAskQuestions

      public boolean canAskQuestions()
      Checks if the user has permission to ask questions. This permission is granted to users with the "student" role and whose discussions are not muted.
      Returns:
      true if the user can ask questions, false otherwise

    • canAnswerQuestions

      public boolean canAnswerQuestions()
      Checks if the user has permission to answer questions. This permission is granted to users with the "student" role and whose discussions are not muted.
      Returns:
      true if the user can answer questions, false otherwise

    • canUpdateReview

      public boolean canUpdateReview()
      Checks if the user has permission to update reviews. This permission is granted to users with the "reviewer" role and whose discussions are not muted.
      Returns:
      true if the user can update reviews, false otherwise

    • canCreateReview

      public boolean canCreateReview()
      Checks if the user has permission to create reviews. This permission is granted to users with the "reviewer" role and whose discussions are not muted.
      Returns:
      true if the user can create reviews, false otherwise

    • canViewReview

      public boolean canViewReview()
      Checks if the user has permission to view reviews. This permission is granted to users with the "reviewer" role. Viewing reviews is still allowed even if discussions are muted.
      Returns:
      true if the user can view reviews, false otherwise

    • canDeleteReview

      public boolean canDeleteReview()
      Checks if the user has permission to delete reviews. This permission is granted to users with the "reviewer" role and whose discussions are not muted.
      Returns:
      true if the user can delete reviews, false otherwise

    • canPromoteReviewer

      public boolean canPromoteReviewer()
      Checks if the user has permission to promote other users to reviewer status. This permission is granted to users with the "instructor" role. Promoting reviewers is still allowed even if discussions are muted.
      Returns:
      true if the user can promote reviewers, false otherwise

    • canSendDirectMessages

      public boolean canSendDirectMessages()
      Checks if the user has permission to send direct messages. This permission is granted to any user whose direct messages are not muted.
      Returns:
      true if the user can send direct messages, false otherwise

    • canDeleteUsers

      public boolean canDeleteUsers()
      Checks if the user has permission to delete other users. This permission is granted to users with the "staff" or "admin" roles.
      Returns:
      true if the user can delete other users, false otherwise

    • canManageUserRoles

      public boolean canManageUserRoles()
      Checks if the user has permission to manage user roles. This permission is granted to users with the "staff" or "admin" roles.
      Returns:
      true if the user can manage user roles, false otherwise

    • isAdmin

      public boolean isAdmin()
      Checks if the user has admin-level privileges. This permission is granted to users with the "admin" role.
      Returns:
      true if the user has admin privileges, false otherwise

    • isStaff

      public boolean isStaff()
      Checks if the user has staff-level privileges. This permission is granted to users with the "staff" role.
      Returns:
      true if the user has staff privileges, false otherwise

    • canBeManaged

      public boolean canBeManaged()
      Checks if the user can be managed by staff members. A user can be managed if they don't have the "admin" or "staff" roles.
      Returns:
      true if the user can be managed by staff, false otherwise

    • canMonitorDirectMessages

      public boolean canMonitorDirectMessages()
      Checks if the user can monitor direct messages. This permission is granted to users with the "staff" or "admin" roles.
      Returns:
      true if the user can monitor direct messages, false otherwise

    • canManageMuteSettings

      public boolean canManageMuteSettings()
      Checks if the user can manage user mute settings. This permission is granted to users with the "staff" or "admin" roles.
      Returns:
      true if the user can manage mute settings, false otherwise

    • hasAnotherRole

      public boolean hasAnotherRole(String role)
      Checks if the user has at least one other role besides the specified role. Used to ensure users always have at least one role.
      Parameters:
      role - the role to exclude from the check
      Returns:
      true if the user has at least one other role, false otherwise
